page.title: 17LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: In Colne Valley there is a Leisure Centre.On Saturday morning there is a Roller disco around the main hall.it costs around 50p.You can hire skates for a bit more.The Swimming Pool is open most days.It is a 25m pool and has a single diving board.There are a few allotments near us which people can hire from Kirklees Council.They use these allotments for growing vegetables and flowers,or keeping pigeons or hens.Football pitches can be found in the area these are used by local teams. A lot of the local public houses run teams in the local leagues.Cricket is popular summer game ,although there are not as many local cricket teams as football teams. {Craig Carter (aged 11)}
